original: intros m x x' z H1 H2. unfold double_link in H2. destruct H2 as [H3 H2]. assert (H: succ m zero x \/ succ m zero x'). { apply (double_link_succ m x x'); auto. } destruct H as [H4 | H4]. - rewrite (cA_B m zero x z H1 H4). destruct (eq_dart_dec x z). -- subst. rewrite bottom_cA_1. rewrite expe_top with (z:=x) (t:=x'); try auto. destruct (eq_dart_dec x' x'); [reflexivity | congruence]. -- destruct (eq_dart_dec x' z). ++ rewrite expe_top with (z:=x) (t:=x'); try auto. rewrite cA_eq_aux. reflexivity. eapply exd_Br1. eauto. eauto. ++ rewrite cA_eq_aux; [reflexivity | eapply exd_Br1; eauto]. - rewrite (cA_B m zero x' z H1 H4). destruct (eq_dart_dec x z). -- subst. rewrite expe_top with (z:=x') (t:=x); try auto. rewrite bottom_cA_1. destruct (eq_dart_dec x x'); [congruence | reflexivity]. -- destruct (eq_dart_dec x' z). ++ subst. rewrite expe_top with (z:=x') (t:=x); try auto. rewrite cA_eq_aux. reflexivity. eapply exd_Br1. eauto. eauto. ++ rewrite cA_eq_aux; [reflexivity | eapply exd_Br1; eauto].
